data.title: Apple: The History And Background Of Apple Company
data.meta_description: Apple Company Background Apple Computer, It’s a multinational company that produces costumers electronics, personal computers, software’s of computers , and...
data.text:
Apple Company Background

Apple Computer, It’s a multinational company that produces costumers electronics, personal computers, software’s of computers , and servers of commercial , and it concentrates in digital distribution of media content. Apple’s main line of product are I phone smart phone , iPad tablet computer , and iPod portable media players. Founders Steve Jobs and Steve Wozniak created Apple first computer on April 1,1976 and joined the company on January 3,1977 in California.

Apple computers was mostly a creator and manufacturer of personal computers, including Apple II , Macintosh, and Power Maclines , but it faced low market sharing and rocky sales during the 1990s. Jobs who had get rid of the company in 1985, returned to apple in 1996 after his company NeXt was bought Apple. The following year he became the company owner and CEO, which later became permanent, and later jobs inspired a new company philosophy of recognizable products and simple design, beginning with the original IMac in 1998.

With the successful IPod Music player in 2001 and ITunes Music Store in 2003, Apple established itself in the market as no one in the costumers electronics and in sailing industries, leading to drop and remove “Computer” from the company’s name in 2007. The Company in popular with its IOS Software of smart phones , media player , and tablet computer products that began with the iPhone , followed by iPod Touch and then iPad. As of 2012, Apple is the largest company in the world In trading by market capitalization, with value of US$626 billion as of September 2012. Apple’s market cap is larger than Microsoft and Google combined together. Apple worldwide annual revenue in 2010 are totaled US$65 billion, growing to US$127.8 billion...

... middle of paper ...

...e company, and they have the self-honesty to admit and prove when they were wrong and the courage to adjust.

Apple Mission

Apple are responsible to bring the best computing experience to their coustmers such as students, educators, creative professionals through its creative hardware, software and internet offerings

The New Product

We are designing a new smart phone that’s you will need to grab your charger with you in everyplace you go and not to get annoyed that your mobile face a low battery problem we are offering a smart phone that grabs his battery charging from the solar energy.

I think this product will contribute a great success in the market share because it will solve really a true problem that faces all the generation now because how many times your mobile phone is turned off because of low energy and low battery situation now this problem is solved.
